content.description: This stellar problems ascends the bullet iron rock face.  While fairly tall there is a large slab behind you can step off onto if you get flustered.  The first move is probably the hardest but it doesn't get that much easier.  Everything is solid but use care on the topout.
content.protection: Don't fall, or step off on the slab behind.
content.location:
From the guns of Navarone boulder problem head SW 40ft towards the Babyface area.  Look for an entrance to crawl under the large boulder to your right.  Crawl under the boulder and pop out on the other side at this problem. 

  To descend walk off to the SW or head 10 ft to the right and downclimb the chimney and back to the start of the problem.

content.description:
Start laying down on a low shelf and move up and right to where you can throw a left hand over the lip.  Make a hard move to get your right hand up to a pinch and a difficult move to get your feet up.  Climb up and slightly right to the obvious hueco.  Drop off from here or continue up the easy, but chossy and high face. 

  There is also a V5 variation that starts the same but goes up and left as you pull over the lip. 

  Being that this is on North it could have been done before.  Not sure as there was a decent amount of choss and dirt.  But since it was a pretty good line, I felt it was worth naming it and adding it here.
content.location: In between "Guns of Navarone" and "Pumped Full of Semen"  Starts on a low shelf in the same corridor you crawl under to the fun V3.

content.description:
This savage crimp line would be four stars if only the holds weren't quite so sharp! 

  Begin sitting on your choice of two of three heavily chalked crimps.  Make a hard move, possibly the crux, up to better holds.  From here work your way left through several holds and eventually a long reach.  Top out on good but potentially very chossy holds.  Beware the huge flake on the right of the topout as it is very hollow sounding.
content.protection: Lots of pads and an attentive spotter. A fall from up high would be scary with the steep slab behind.
content.location:
See above area description.  The obvious line of crimps on the steep arete.  The problem itself faces SE so you can't see it until you are on the uphill side. 

  To descend a fun V0 can be downclimbed on the left side of Guns of Navarone.

content.description: This area contains a few great problems that aren't yet listed in print.  A few of these problems may become future classics!  The area only contains three problems that I know of but may be a few others on the nearby boulders.
